organizations.name: Alpha
organizations.description: Equipping churches, ministries, and individuals to help others discover and develop a relationship with Jesus is our mission. We estimate that more than a million people in the U.S. have experienced Alpha for themselves in the last three years, and we are grateful to be a part of making that journey possible.

organizations.name: American Association of Christian Counselors
organizations.description: The World's Premiere and Largest Christian Mental Health Organization. Dedicated to Distinctly Christian Clinical Excellence.

organizations.name: Best Christian Workplaces
organizations.description: Best Christian Workplaces helps you build a flourishing workplace culture. We have served over 1,000 ministry partners with our PhD-backed survey data.

organizations.name: Biblica
organizations.description: Biblica is a global Bible ministry, releasing the world’s most widely read Scriptures for maximum Gospel impact. Now in its third century of mission, Biblica continues to produce relevant and reliable Scripture translations and innovative resources that power the Bible ministry of hundreds of global mission organizations and invite millions to discover the love of Jesus Christ.

organizations.name: Bless App
organizations.description: The Bless App, formerly 'Bless Every Home', was created to equip and unleash followers of Jesus to be a blessing to their community. It provides technology that serves, encourages, and challenges people and churches to put their faith into action.

organizations.name: Care4Pastors
organizations.description: A global network empowering people to experience and reproduce great relationships through loving God and others. We exist to equip, train, resource, and support pastors, network and ministry leaders, to do their ministries with great commandment love.

organizations.name: CarePortal
organizations.description: CarePortal connects communities to meet urgent needs and prevent foster care, making it easy for you to respond to real-time requests anytime, right from your phone. With just a few taps, you can help families stay together and strengthen your community.

organizations.name: Carey Nieuwhof
organizations.description: Carey Nieuwhof is a best-selling leadership author, speaker, podcaster, former attorney, and church planter. He hosts one of today’s most influential leadership podcasts, and his online content is accessed by leaders over 1.5 million times a month. He speaks to leaders around the world about leadership, change, and personal growth.

organizations.name: Christianity Today
organizations.description: Christianity Today is a global media ministry that engages millions of Christian leaders every month, encouraging and equipping them to advocate for the church and shape the evangelical conversation.

organizations.name: Churches Care
organizations.description: Churches Care connects individuals with local churches and ministries to provide support and community for those in need.

organizations.name: Church United
organizations.description: Church United was an idea birthed by local pastors who desired to see greater connection and collaboration between our local churches. Our unity and love for one another is how the world will know and believe the message of Jesus. The Church is the hope of the world and South Florida. God’s people—the Church—are the means by which our cities, neighborhoods, workplaces, and dinner tables are filled with the presence of Jesus Christ (Ephesians 1:23).

organizations.name: Compassion International
organizations.description: Compassion International is a Christian child development organization dedicated to releasing children from poverty in Jesus’ name. Founded in 1952, Compassion partners with more than 8,500 local churches in 29 program countries to deliver spiritual, economic, social, and physical care to over two million babies, children, and young adults in poverty.

organizations.name: ECFA
organizations.description: The Evangelical Council for Financial Accountability (ECFA) is an accreditation agency dedicated to helping Christian ministries earn the public’s trust through adherence to Seven Standards of Responsible Stewardship™.

organizations.name: FOCUS
organizations.description: The Fellowship of Catholic University Students (FOCUS) invites college students into a growing relationship with Jesus Christ and His Church, inspiring and equipping them for a lifetime of Christ-centered evangelization, discipleship, and friendships in which they lead others to do the same.

organizations.name: FORCLT
organizations.description: For Charlotte is a gospel-centered network of Christian churches collaborating for the good of our city, focusing on uniting the church to transform the city through various initiatives and community engagement.

organizations.name: For Columbus
organizations.description: For Columbus is a Christian movement that seeks to unify the city-Church in tangible ways so that the power of the gospel brings about cultural transformation and renewal in Columbus.

organizations.name: Gloo
organizations.description: We shape technology as a force for good - serving those who serve, to help them scale their purposes, so people flourish and communities thrive.

organizations.name: Hope with God
organizations.description: Hope With God is an online Christian community that connects over 20 million believers across the globe. We provide discipleship and Gospel resources to help people find hope in God through Jesus Christ.

organizations.name: MediShare
organizations.description: Medi-Share is a nonprofit health care sharing ministry where members voluntarily share each other's medical expenses in accordance with guidelines adopted by the members and administered by Christian Care Ministry.

organizations.name: MomCo
organizations.description: The MomCo is a nonprofit dedicated to connecting and empowering moms through community, resources, and support. Find your tribe, join meetups, and access tools to navigate every stage of motherhood.

organizations.name: MyCounselor.Online
organizations.description: Partners For Strong Families exists to strengthen families by increasing access to excellent counseling and marriage resources.

organizations.name: Nitrogen Urban Network
organizations.description: Nitrogen Network equips leaders, pastors, and churches for the work of urban ministry, focusing on community development and leadership training.

organizations.name: OneNeed
organizations.description: OneNeed helps churches respond with compassion to every person in need, equipping them to serve their communities with generosity and hope.

organizations.name: Outreach
organizations.description: Outreach Inc. has a heart for the local church, helping churches build bridges to the unchurched to effectively share Christ. They provide a comprehensive list of products and services, including digital products, sermon series resources, and more, to over 163,000 churches across the U.S.

organizations.name: PastorServe
organizations.description: PastorServe is dedicated to strengthening the Church by supporting pastors, vocational ministry leaders, and their spouses through coaching, soul care, crisis support, and consulting. We aim to help ministry leaders thrive in life and leadership.

organizations.name: Prison Fellowship
organizations.description: Prison Fellowship is the Nation’s largest Prison Ministry where our mission is to seek the transformation of prisoners and their reconciliation to God, family, and community through the power and truth of Jesus Christ; and the transformation of believers as they apply biblical thinking to all of life, enabling them to transform their communities through the grace and truth of Jesus Christ.

organizations.name: Pulse Evangelism
organizations.description: Pulse Evangelism makes Jesus known through the engines of digital and in-person evangelism, prayer, and partnership. Since its founding, Pulse Evangelism has shared the hope of Jesus to over 330 million people through live events, digital ministry, local revival gatherings, and evangelism training.

organizations.name: RightNow Media
organizations.description: RightNow Media serves 18,000 churches and businesses every day in 25 countries. Our streaming media service allows Christians to access over 20,000 biblical videos from 250 of the top Christian publishers, ministries, and communicators in the country.

organizations.name: Safe House Project
organizations.description: Safe House Project is a national nonprofit organization dedicated to combatting human trafficking. Our mission is to raise the identification rate of survivors beyond one percent through education, provide emergency services to survivors, and ensure that every survivor has access to safe housing and holistic care.

organizations.name: Salem Media
organizations.description: Salem Media Group is America’s leading multimedia company specializing in Christian and conservative content, with media properties comprising radio, digital media and book and newsletter publishing. Each day Salem serves a loyal and dedicated audience of listeners, readers and viewers numbering in the millions nationally.

organizations.name: Soul Care
organizations.description: Soul Care provides resources and support for organizations to enhance the soul health of their teams, focusing on spiritual, mental, and emotional well-being.

organizations.name: Spire Network
organizations.description: A community built for ministry leaders, focusing on encouraging and equipping leaders who inspire a movement of healthy growing churches.

organizations.name: The Chosen
organizations.description: Come and See is dedicated to introducing the world to Jesus through the production and translation of The Chosen, aiming to reach a billion people with the authentic message of Jesus.

organizations.name: The Pastors Collective
organizations.description: The Pastors Collective is a non-profit organization dedicated to helping pastors, their partners, and ministry leaders from all denominations learn to be well so they can build well. We provide support through retreats, community, and resources focused on mental health in ministry.

organizations.name: Transforming the Bay for Christ
organizations.description: Transforming the Bay with Christ (TBC) supports local leaders in the church, the marketplace, and the nonprofit sector to catalyze a Gospel movement in the Bay Area. We focus on connecting, equipping, and encouraging collaboration among leaders of faith. We believe empowering them will impact the lives of millions of individuals in the San Francisco Bay Area.

organizations.name: UniteUs
organizations.description: Unite exists to see college students gathered to lift the name of Jesus, providing a welcoming environment for non-believers to hear the Gospel, and for believers to experience freedom and community.

organizations.name: Upward Sports
organizations.description: Upward Sports partners with churches to leverage the power of sports to help churches achieve and increase the impact of their mission. Upward utilizes sports to share the gospel and promote the discovery of Jesus in every community.

organizations.name: Wesleyan Investment Foundation
organizations.description: Wesleyan Investment Foundation provides loan assistance to churches and church-related entities to help them expand their facilities, purchase land, build, renovate, or refinance current debt. They operate as a nonprofit organization, focusing on faith-based investment opportunities.

organizations.name: Winter Jam
organizations.description: Winter Jam is a Christian music tour featuring various artists and speakers, providing a platform for worship and community engagement.

organizations.name: Wycliffe Associates
organizations.description: Wycliffe Associates empowers national Bible translators under the authority of the local church in each community. Together with our donors and prayer partners, we are following God’s call to accelerate Bible translation in the most remote, most antagonistic parts of the world.
